member_organisations:
Six affiliate organisations: 
Kenya (Africa) 
India (Asia) 
Pakistan (Asia) 
USA (North America) 
Netherlands 
Egypt 
 
Two branch organisations: 
Ethiopia (Africa) 
Senegal (Africa)
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Public Health, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
- monitor the work of DG SANTE's Animal Health and Welfare Unit particular in relation to global activities. 
- monitor the work of DG DEVCO, DG ECHO, EEAS and DG AGRI 
- monitor EP legislative process in relation to agriculture, animal welfare and international development 
- participate in EU consultations on relevant topics (animal welfare, international development) 
- membership of DG SANTE expert group on animal welfare
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
BOND (and through BOND also members of CONCORD) 
UK Food Group 
Gender and Development Network 
All Party Parliamentary Group on Animal Welfare 
All Party Parliamentary Group on Food and Agriculture for Development
inter_groups: Intergroup on Welfare and Conservation of Animals
